content.question: ​The point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> has polar coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses 10 comma fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 6 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is the location of point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in rectangular coordinates?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 square root of 3 comma 5 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 , 5 square root of 3 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5,5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses 5 square root of 3 comma 5 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses 5 square root of 3 comma negative 5 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 square root of 3 comma 5 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
